title: Badr Interactive
description: At Badr, I joined the Malawi team to manage the Smile Malawi, which was designed for use in Malawi. After successfully completing the Smile Malawi project, I transitioned to the Platform team, where I worked on developing Smile Platform, a platform designed to organize and integrate the various features of Smile Web into one cohesive system. This experience has allowed me to contribute to impactful projects while gaining valuable insights into platform development and management.

Through this role, I gained invaluable insights into the intricate logistics and operations of the shipping industry, contributing to the seamless flow of goods and services.
